title: Spider-Man: Itsuwari no Aka
original_name: スパイダーマン／偽りの赤
sinopse:
High School outcast and Spider-Man fan Yuu leads a life of unfulfilled expectations. But after finding the Legendary Webslinger's suit in an alley, his life makes a big change! What could be lying in store for this aspiring young lad!

(Source: MangaDex)
